title: I'm forced to re-log into league every first game of the day.
body: Every first game that I play of league during the day, game crashes and I have to re-log, causing a remake and me getting punished. Reinstalling doesn't help.

replies.body: I'd like to help but will need some more information.  When you crash, what is happening and when?  Are you receiving any error messages, and what does it say?  Let me know!
